definition: to have a win in the lottery

sentences.english: He fantasized about winning the lottery.
sentences.chinese: 他已经幻想自己赢到乐透。

sentences.english: After winning the lottery jackpot, he went from rags to riches overnight.
sentences.chinese: 赢了乐透头彩后，他一夕之间从一贫如洗变成富翁。

sentences.english: As a result, many state lotteries have redesigned their tickets.
sentences.chinese: 结果，很多州的乐透重新设计了它们的彩票。

sentences.english: Lotto night comes and Babbette still has no luck.
sentences.chinese: 乐透开奖的夜晚来临了，但芭芘特还是没有运气。

sentences.english: This item can be won in the custom item lottery.
sentences.chinese: 本物品可在物品乐透中获得。

sentences.english: You pray at temples for a winning lottery number.
sentences.chinese: 在寺庙里祈求乐透中奖号码。

sentences.english: We save winning lotto picks in a text file.
sentences.chinese: 把赢奖的乐透选择保存到文本文件中。

sentences.english: By American retailing standards, Tesco is merely dipping a toe in the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 按照美国零售业标准，乐透才仅仅刚入行。

sentences.english: When it is when there is envy in the Lotto , who not surprising.
sentences.chinese: 当它时，是在乐透，谁也就不足为奇羡慕。

sentences.english: Instead of secretly plundering the game, he decided to go to the Ontario Lottery and Gaming Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 他没有秘密地抢劫乐透，而是决定找安大略博彩公司。

sentences.english: Lotto Creo Pro helps you to play the lottery in an intelligent and simple way.
sentences.chinese: 乐透克里奥亲帮助您发挥彩票在智能及简单的途径。

sentences.english: Complaining about a lottery talent in the second round is lame.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟在第二轮选中乐透选手是很炫的事。

sentences.english: "I feel like I just won the lotto, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “我感觉就像刚刚赢得了乐透大奖，”他如是说。

sentences.english: In addition, the three-point shot has created a kind of lotto fever.
sentences.chinese: 此外，三分球命中已经形成了一种乐透发烧。

sentences.english: Lotto night comes and somebody else wins it.
sentences.chinese: 乐透开奖的晚上，别人把奖赢走了。

definition: to win a prize/a successful gamble
to announce the winners in a lottery
to throw one's energies (into an activity)/to invest one's emotions (in sth)/to bet/betting
lottery run by China Welfare Lottery, a government agency that uses a portion of the money from ticket sales to fund welfare projects (abbr. for 福利彩票[fu2 li4 cai3 piao4])
to try to answer a question (in a quiz, guessing game, riddle etc)/quiz game
sports lottery (sports betting run by a government agency, China Sports Lottery) (abbr. for 體育彩票|体育彩票[ti3 yu4 cai3 piao4])
